title: Does Noam Chomsky Hate America?
description:
Patrick Bet-David has a virtual sit-down with philosopher and political activist Noam Chomsky. In this interview they talk about the American Dream, capitalism, philosophy, American history and the future of America. 

Check out his website: https://bit.ly/2SN0iiW

Recommended video:
- Heated Debate On Capitalism with America’s Most Prominent Marxist Economist - Richard Wolff: https://youtu.be/wj-zFgxCUnY
- Communist Philosopher Debates Capitalism - Slavoj Žižek: https://youtu.be/GHH96Fc0_lo

About the guest: Avram Noam Chomsky is an American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist. Sometimes called "the father of modern linguistics", Chomsky is also a major figure in analytic philosophy and one of the founders of the field of cognitive science.
